content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    --TOP 100 *
    format([Date], 'yyyy-MM') as [Date]
    ,sum(CostInBillingCurrency) as [S909 Cost]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost/202403*/Extended_v3_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_*.parquet/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
    where SubscriptionName = 'S138-SAP-Solution-Landscape'
    --where SubscriptionName LIKE 'S138%'
    group by format([Date], 'yyyy-MM')
